title: vElavanai
sahitya:
vElavanai ninaindirundAl tEDi varum inbam vaDi


anupallavi

  nIlamayil mEl viLangum kAlaikkadir nigar kumaran nIlamaNi vAlai magizh nIlakaNThan nudal shuDarAm


caraNam    jyOti mukhamArum uyar tOLgaL paniraNDum tOghai irumangaigaLum shUzvarum azhagum 
tAda vizhum kaDamba malarttArum kaN kuLirak-kanDu sharaNamenat-tAL paNindu dayavuDanE kArumenru
